mainTask: Write an article about the benefits of travelling

subtasks.subtaskName: Brainstorm and list potential benefits of travelling
Research the chosen benefits in detail (e.g., stress reduction, personal growth, cultural understanding)
Find supporting evidence and statistics for each benefit (e.g., studies, articles, travel blogs)
Create an outline for the article, structuring the benefits logically
Write the introduction to the article
Write the body paragraphs, each focusing on a specific benefit with supporting evidence
Write the conclusion summarizing the key benefits of travelling
Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity
Format the article for readability (headings, subheadings, images, etc.)
